articles.title: Kim Jong Il Gives Field Guidance to Namhung Youth Chemical Complex
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Gives Field Guidance to Namhung Youth Chemical Complex 
Pyongyang, May 7 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il provided field guidance to the Namhung Youth Chemical Complex.
					 Kim Jong Il looked round different places including the general control room for fertilizer production and fertilizer forwarding shop for hours to learn in detail about the construction and production there. 
					
					 It is a miracle that the workers of Namhung successfully completed the construction of the second system of gasification process in a short span of time by their own efforts and with their own technology, he noted, highly praising them for building a giant structure by displaying popular heroism and patriotic devotion. 
					
					 The completion of the first and second systems of gasification process in Namhung is a shining victory of President Kim Il Sung's idea of building Juche-oriented chemical industry and a precious fruition of the tremendous mental power of the Korean workers intensely loyal to the party and the leader, he said, and continued: 
					
					 "Our party is strong and our socialist country is winning one victory after another thanks to the huge unit of the revolutionary and militant workers who performed shining feats in the gasification project under the slogan 'Korea does what it is determined to do!'" 
					
					 Then he went round the stable, the essential foodstuff shop and Chongchun Health Complex to learn in detail about the supply service at the complex and cultural and emotional life of the workers there. 
					
					 Everything is going well at the complex thanks to the good supply service, he said, praising the party and administrative officials of the complex for retaining a firm hold on the supply service and making tenacious efforts to improve it with a correct view on the workers, the master of production. 
					
					 Watching a volleyball match and swimming in the newly built modern Chongchun Health Complex, he was pleased that the workers were having an ample cultural rest. 
					
					 He watched various consumer goods produced by the complex before stressing the need to produce many more quality goods very necessary for improving the standard of people's living. 
					
					 The most important task before the complex is to focus efforts on keeping the production of fertilizers going at a high rate and send greater quantity of fertilizers to the socialist cooperative fields, he said.
					
					 Another important task before the complex is to wage a dynamic drive to increase the varieties of chemical products needed for people's living, he added.
					
					 Underscoring the need to intensify the drive for building modern process for the production of plastic propylene fabric as an immediate task, he set forth the task and ways to do so.
					
					 He called on the officials, workers and technicians of the complex to make strenuous efforts to keep the production going at a high rate and develop the complex under a long-term plan. 
					
					 He was accompanied by Jang Song Thaek, alternate member of the Political Bureau of the C.C., the WPK and vice-chairman of the NDC, Thae Jong Su, alternate member of the Political Bureau and secretary of the C.C., the WPK, Ju Kyu Chang, alternate member of the Political Bureau and department director of the C.C., the WPK, and Hong In Bom, chief secretary of the South Phyongan Provincial Committee of the WPK.

articles.title: Namibian PM Hopes for Closer Cooperation with DPRK
articles.content:
Namibian PM Hopes for Closer Cooperation with DPRK
						
 Pyongyang, May 7 (KCNA) -- Namibia hopes for positively promoting cooperation with the DPRK in various fields.
					 Namibian Prime Minister Nahas Angula said this on April 26 when meeting with the outgoing DPRK Ambassador to his country An Hui Jong.
					
					 I will always remember the deep impressions I got while visiting the DPRK several times in the past, the prime minister said, and went on:
					
					 Namibia supports the calls made by the DPRK in a joint editorial for this year for giving spurs to light industry once again to bring about a decisive turn in improving the standard of people's living and building a thriving nation and for positively promoting dialogue in order to preserve peace on the Korean Peninsula.
					
					 It is our conviction that the Korean people will certainly build a thriving nation on the basis of the self-supporting national economy.
					
					 The war maneuvers of the U.S. and the south Korean authorities are incompatible with dialogue. 
					
					 We strongly denounce the hostile forces for their provocations against the DPRK.

articles.title: Pakistani President on Korea's Reunification
articles.content:
Pakistani President on Korea's Reunification
 Pyongyang, May 7 (KCNA) -- We hope that the Korean people would put an end to national division at an early date and hand down the reunified country to posterity, said Asif Ali Zardari, president of Pakistan, on May 2 when he accepted credentials of DPRK Ambassador to his country Ro Kyong Chol.
					 The president said that he could not forget the days when he together with Prime Minister Benazir Bhutto visited the DPRK to have an audience with President Kim Il Sung in 1993.

articles.title: Wangjaesan Art Troupe Performs in Pyongyang
articles.content:
Wangjaesan Art Troupe Performs in Pyongyang
 Pyongyang, May 7 (KCNA) -- The Wangjaesan Art Troupe, one of the DPRK's famous art troupes, has performed at the People's Palace of Culture in Pyongyang, winning a great popularity.
					 Since the premiere on April 23, more than 42,000 people have enjoyed the performance.
					
					 The performance, which begins with the women's vocal sextet "We Live in the Embrace of the Leader", touches heartstrings of the audience from the start. 
					
					 The program includes a violin ensemble "A Horse Sledge Carrying Pleasure", dance "White Birch in Native Home Garden", a folk dance "Ongheya" and tap dance "At the Spring Site".
					
					 Ri Yon Ok, a 48-year-old woman living in Taedonggang District, Pyongyang, told KCNA that the performance was so excellent that she was unaware of the passage of time.
					
					 Choe Myong Chon, a 36-year-old teacher of Kim Il Sung University, said the performance was wonderful enough to show that Wangjaesan is one of the most popular art troupes in the country.

articles.title: S. Korean Puppet Warmongers' War Maneuvers Blasted
articles.content:
S. Korean Puppet Warmongers' War Maneuvers Blasted
 Pyongyang, May 7 (KCNA) -- The Inchon People for Achieving Peace and Reunification of south Korea and other civic and public organizations in Inchon area at a press conference outside the city office on May 3 denounced the puppet warmongers for their projected frantic war exercises.
					 At the conference the organizations accused the military authorities of contemplating staging naval firing drills on Paekryong Island and Yonphyong Island in the West Sea of Korea that day with various type artillery pieces, fighters, patrol ships and other weapons for preemptive attack involved.
					
					 This will escalate the military tension on the Korean Peninsula as it is an act of diametrically turning down the demand of the people for putting an end to confrontation and an early establishment of a special zone for peace and cooperation in the West Sea, they charged.
					
					 Recalling that the drills will be observed by officers of the U.S. Marines present in Okinawa who are staging joint military exercises with south Korea in Ryonchon, Kyonggi Province, in particular, the organizations noted that they cannot but entertain misgivings about the fact that the drills are pursuant to the provocative "local war scenario."
					
					 The ceaseless war maneuvers in the West Sea of Korea have turned it into tension-ridden waters, the organizations held, stressing that it is impossible to improve the inter-Korean relations unless the West Sea of Korea is turned into a sea of peace.
					
					 The organizations strongly urged the authorities to opt for settling the issue of inter-Korean relations in a peaceful way.

articles.title: S. Korean Puppet Government's Sycophancy toward Japan Slammed
articles.content:
S. Korean Puppet Government's Sycophancy toward Japan Slammed
						
 Pyongyang, May 7 (KCNA) -- The Solidarity for Democracy, People's Life, Peaceful Reunification and Sovereignty of south Korea released a commentary on May 2 condemning the puppet government for its sycophancy toward Japan.
					 The commentary accused the "government" of submitting to the International Maritime Organization a proposal on April 30 that the East Sea of Korea and "Japan Sea" should be marked simultaneously.
					
					 What is more ridiculous was that the authorities asserted they would push forward the separate marking of the East Sea of Korea step by step in the future while clumsily excusing for  their treacherous behavior, the commentary said, branding this as sheer sophism.
					
					 In the past century the Korean nation suffered such disgrace as being deprived of not only territory but seas and sky by the Japanese imperialists, the commentary noted, and went on:
					
					 Nevertheless, the authorities made a proposal before any others to mark the East Sea of Korea and "Japan Sea" simultaneously. It is only the Lee Myung Bak "government" in the world which did not hesitate to commit such sycophancy and treachery. 
					
					 The commentary slashed at the present "government" for following in the footsteps of wicked traitor Ri Wan Yong, hell-bent on humiliating and sycophantic diplomacy.

articles.title: Latin American Regional Seminar on Juche Idea Held in Mexico
articles.content:
Latin American Regional Seminar on Juche Idea Held in Mexico
 Pyongyang, May 7 (KCNA) -- A Latin American regional seminar on the Juche idea and the struggle for independence against imperialism took place in Mexico on April 29.
					Displayed in the venue of the seminar were works of President Kim Il Sung and General Secretary Kim Jong Il and books and photos on the successes made by the Korean people in building a thriving nation.
					
					 Present there on invitation were the DPRK ambassador to Mexico and his embassy officials and the delegation of the Social Scientists Society of Korea.
					
					 The secretary general of the Latin American Institute of the Juche Idea delivered a report to be followed by congratulatory speeches by the head of the delegation of the Social Scientists Society of Korea and the general secretary of the C.C., the People's Socialist Party of Mexico. 
					
					 The floor was taken by the chairman of the  Peru-Korea Friendship Institute for Study of the Juche-based Songun Policy, the president of the Group for the Study of the Juche Idea "Kanggye" of Colombia, the chairman of the Mexican Institute for the Study of the Juche Idea and other personages under the titles "Let us explore the road of socialist cause under uplifted banner of independence against imperialism",  "Let us advance under uplifted banner of independence, self-support and self-reliance", "Let us build a new independent world free from any domination, subjugation, aggression and war" and "Unity means victory and division death".
					
					 The reporter and speakers highly praised President Kim Il Sung as a great teacher and eternal sun of the world progressives.
					
					 They praised Kim Jong Il for having turned the DPRK into a political, ideological and military power and conducted unremitting revolutionary activities for building an economic power, thus striking the world people with admiration.
					
					 Noting that the Juche idea serves as a powerful weapon of the struggle against imperialism for the Latin American people, they called upon the people of the region to take joint actions against the "globalization" of the U.S.-led imperialists to frustrate all kinds of moves for domination, interference and blockade in order to build peaceful and independent Latin America.
					
					  They stressed the need to positively learn from the struggle of the Korean people and strengthen the solidarity with the people of the fraternal countries in their struggle against all sorts of exploitation and subjugation.
					
					 An appeal to the followers of the Juche idea of the world was adopted at the seminar.
					
					 Noting that it fully supports and welcomes the decision of the 13th enlarged meeting of the Executive Committee of the Board of Directors of the International Institute of the Juche Idea to convene the world conference on the Juche idea in Pyongyang in April 2012, it ardently called upon the followers of the Juche idea to take the lead in greeting the Day of the Sun of the next year as the greatest holiday of mankind.
					
					 A letter to Kim Jong Il was adopted at the seminar.

articles.title: Letter from Participants in Seminar on Juche Idea
articles.content:
Letter from Participants in Seminar on Juche Idea
 Pyongyang, May 7 (KCNA) -- Leader Kim Jong Il received a letter from the participants in the Latin American regional seminar on the Juche idea and the struggle for independence against imperialism held in Mexico on April 29. 
					 The letter said:
					
					The participants of the seminar keenly realized that President Kim Il Sung performed immortal feats for the victory of the popular masses' cause of independence against imperialism under the uplifted banner of the Juche idea all his life and General Secretary Kim Jong Il has made indefatigable efforts for global independence while frustrating all kinds of arbitrary practices and challenge of the imperialists.
					
					 The Juche idea serves as a great guiding idea and a great revolutionary doctrine to be held fast to in the struggle for foiling the high-handed and arbitrary practices of the imperialists and hegemonic forces and for achieving the independent development of the country and the nation and the victory of the cause of independence against imperialism.
					
					 The participants hardened the conviction that the popular masses can achieve the cause of independence against imperialism only when they dynamically advance under the banner of the Juche idea, the letter noted.
					
					 The letter evinced their determination to embody the Juche idea in conformity with the specific realities and actual conditions of their countries and thus make a positive contribution to accomplishing the cause of independence against imperialism, bearing deep in their mind the mission and responsibility of the times that they are the introducers and disseminators of the great idea in the future, too.

articles.title: KPA Praised by British Organization
articles.content:
KPA Praised by British Organization 
						
 Pyongyang, May 7 (KCNA) -- The British Association for the Study of Songun Policy posted on its Internet homepage an article on April 29 on the occasion of the 79th founding anniversary of the Korean People's Army.
					 The article noted that the KPA is a matchless army fighting against the U.S. imperialists, the enemy of the world progressives.
					
					 It noted:
					
					 President Kim Il Sung founded the Anti-Japanese People's Guerrilla Army on April 25, 1932, and liberated the country. He directed his primary efforts to building regular armed forces and a self-supporting defence industry after the liberation of the country.
					
					 The KPA, the Juche-oriented armed forces which carried forward the anti-Japanese revolutionary traditions, dealt deadly blows at the U.S. imperialists in the Korean War in the 1950s. It thus marked the beginning of decline for the U.S. imperialists.
					
					General Secretary Kim Jong Il, a creditable successor to the President's Juche-oriented cause of army building, started the Songun revolutionary leadership in August 1960. Under his leadership the KPA has grown stronger. 
					
					 The KPA founded by the President and led by Kim Jong Il is the powerful Songun armed forces, concluded the article.

articles.title: Activities for Rescue of Afflicted Compatriots Brisk in Japan as All-compatriots Movement
articles.content:
Activities for Rescue of Afflicted Compatriots Brisk in Japan as All-compatriots Movement
 Pyongyang, May 7 (KCNA) -- The organizations of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon) and compatriots are carrying on their united actions to rescue the compatriots afflicted by massive quake and the ensuing tsunami.
					Nam Sung U, vice-chairman of the Central Standing Committee of Chongryon, conveying the relief fund General Secretary Kim Jong Il sent to the victims, encouraged them to bring their living to normal as early as possible with firm will in reliance upon the motherland and Chongryon organizations.
					
					 Officials of the Central Standing Committee of the Korean Youth League in Japan called upon the officials and members of the league active at the Miyagi Prefectural Headquarters of the Central Emergency Measure Committee of Chongryon to unite close to conduct dynamic activities for rescuing compatriots.
					
					 Directors of the commercial associations in Miyagi, Fukushima, Aomori, Iwate, Akita and Yamagata prefectures and officials of the Miyagi Prefectural Headquarters of the Central Emergency Measure Committee of Chongryon held an emergency meeting in the office of the commercial association in the prefecture and called on the association to creditably perform its role in bringing a new heyday in the movement of Koreans in Japan.
					
					 The Ubeonoda Branch in Yamaguchi Prefecture under Chongryon held an emergency meeting of chiefs and deputy chiefs of organizations and enterprises under the branch on the theme of "Let us help affected compatriots" and secured aid materials and handed them to Tohoku Korean Primary and Middle School.
					
					 Brisk rescue activities are going on in various forms in different areas of Japan.
					
					 The Miyagi Prefectural Rescue Group of Chongryon visited those affected compatriots and is playing a big role in the rehabilitation. The students of Tokyo Korean Senior High School called upon compatriots to help the afflicted Koreans. They got in touch with Choson Sinbo, the newspaper published by Koreans in Japan, so that it might carry articles introducing different rescue activities conducted by the Korean community after the occurrence of the killer quake. 
					
					 Korean football players provided funds to help the afflicted compatriots.
					
					 The officials of the Central Standing Management Board of the Korean Youth Commercial Association in Japan handed to the Central Standing Committee of Chongryon ten million yen they have collected out of compatriotism.

articles.title: Japanese Working People Demand Settlement of Accident at Nuclear Power Plant
articles.content:
Japanese Working People Demand Settlement of Accident at Nuclear Power Plant 
						
 Pyongyang, May 7 (KCNA) -- A mass meeting took place in Tokyo on May 1 demanding the settlement of the accident at a nuclear power plant.
					 Present there were at least 21,000 working people.
					
					 The participants in the meeting demanded the government bring the accident at the Fukushima Nuclear Power Plant under control as early as possible and reexamine its energy policy.

articles.title: Russian Prime Minister on accident at Nuclear Power Plant of Japan
articles.content:
Russian Prime Minister on accident at Nuclear Power Plant of Japan
 Moscow, May 5 (KCNA) -- Russian Prime Minister Vladimir Putin at a recent meeting of experts on nuclear power referred to the accident at the Fukushima Nuclear Power Plant of Japan. 
					 Japan built nuclear power plants in the areas fraught with the danger of earthquake, he said, adding that there are such areas everywhere in Japan.
					
					 The delayed provision of electricity for cooling reactors at the time of the accident at the Fukushima Nuclear Power Plant caused such serious situation, he held.

articles.title: Russian Party Leader Calls for Unity of All Russians
articles.content:
Russian Party Leader Calls for Unity of All Russians
						
 Moscow, May 5 (KCNA) -- Vladimir Zhirinovsky, leader of the Liberal Democratic Party of Russia, addressing a meeting marking May Day held in Moscow on Sunday, called for the unity of all Russians.
					  He stressed that not only people having the same job or inhabitants in the same city but the whole nation and all the Russians should get united to realize the modernization of the country.

articles.title: Russia Worries over US Plan for MD System
articles.content:
Russia Worries over US Plan for MD System
Moscow, May 5 (KCNA) -- The Russian Foreign Ministry on May 3 worried the U.S. missile shield in Europe could be turned against Russia, targeting its strategic nuclear forces.
					 The U.S. agreed with the Romanian authorities to deploy U.S. missile interceptors in Romania. The Russian Foreign Ministry said this "practical step" by the U.S. to create a European segment of its global missile defense system was made regardless of Russian-U.S. dialogue on anti-missile issues. 
					
					 Such plan may pose a danger to Russia's strategic nuclear deterrent, the ministry said, adding that Russia would closely watch the future developments.

articles.title: China's Step for Cultural Development
articles.content:
China's Step for Cultural Development
 Beijing, May 5 (KCNA) -- Li Changchun, member of the Standing Committee of the Political Bureau of the C.C., the Communist Party of China, referred to the development of cultural work at a recent national meeting for reforming the cultural system.
					 He underscored the need to keep hold on the theme of scientific development and direct efforts to removing obstacles to the cultural development according to the general task for the economic and social development during the 12th Five-Year Plan.

articles.title: China Slams US Interference
articles.content:
China Slams US Interference
						
 Beijing, May 5 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the Chinese Foreign Ministry in a press conference on May 4 accused "the International Committee of Religious Freedom" of the U.S. of interfering in the internal affairs of China over the religious issue.
					 The Chinese government is guaranteeing citizens' freedom of religion and belief by law and the Chinese people are fully enjoying this freedom in reliance on law, he said.
					
					 He urged the Committee to discard prejudice, respect facts and stop interfering in the internal affairs of China by way of issuing a report.

articles.title: Youth Day Marked in China
articles.content:
Youth Day Marked in China
 Beijing, May 5 (KCNA) -- The Youth Day was marked in China.
					 There were a ceremony for awarding the youth May 4 medal of China and a joint performance of university students in Beijing on Wednesday.
					
					 Organizations of the Communist Youth League of China across the country arranged meetings and round-table talks and officials of the League in Beijing and Shanghai went to schools and organs at all levels and the countryside to introduce the feats of the Communist Party of China.
					
					 League organizations in Chongqing Municipality, Jiangsu and Zhejiang provinces and Ningxia Hui Autonomous Region organized concerts and visits to centers for education in patriotism.
					
					 In Shichuan Province there was a poem recitation of university students recollecting the course traversed by the League under the leadership of the CPC.
					
					 Events including oath-taking meeting for admission to the League took place in Anhui and Hainan provinces.

articles.title: Lebanon Welcomes Palestinian Reconciliation
articles.content:
Lebanon Welcomes Palestinian Reconciliation
 Pyongyang, May 7 (KCNA) -- Lebanese caretaker Prime Minister Saad Hariri on Wednesday welcomed the reconciliation agreement between Fatah and Hamas.
					 The reconciliation between the two parties was a blessed step to protect the Palestinian people and establish an independent state, Hariri said.
					
					 The Lebanese government called on the international community to comply with the requirements of the Palestinian national unity, he noted.

articles.title: Egypt Urges US to Back Palestinian State Declaration
articles.content:
Egypt Urges US to Back Palestinian State Declaration
 Cairo, May 5 (KCNA) -- The Egyptian foreign minister in a recent address urged the United States to support the declaration of an independent Palestinian state.
					 Egypt fully supports the Palestinian plan to build an independent state, he said.
					
					 He said that the U.S. should view a re-united Palestinian movement, including Hamas, as a positive development, and that it should persuade Israel to negotiate with it.

articles.title: US Military Deaths in Afghanistan at 1,461
articles.content:
US Military Deaths in Afghanistan at 1,461
 Pyongyang, May 7 (KCNA) -- The death toll of the U.S. troops keen on "anti-terrorism war" in Afghanistan is rising due to the attack operation of the resistance forces of the country.
					 At least 1 461 members of the U.S. military had died in Afghanistan since the start of U.S. military operations in Afghanistan, said the U.S. Defense Department on May 3.

articles.title: S. Osetia Denounces Wrong Action of Western Countries
articles.content:
S. Osetia Denounces Wrong Action of Western Countries
Pyongyang, May 7 (KCNA) -- The Southern Osetia Foreign Ministry recently issued a commentary in denunciation of the wrong action of Western countries. 
					 The commentary accused the EU of issuing a statement supporting Georgia's ambition for territorial expansion and warned it would spark a new military action against Southern Osetia. 
					
					 This action of the West is, in fact, little short of instigating Georgia to launch new aggression, the commentary added.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il dirige el Complejo Químico Juventud de Namhung
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il dirige el Complejo Químico Juventud de Namhung
						
Pyongyang, 7 de mayo (ATCC) -- El Dirigente  Kim Jong Il, Secretario General del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y Presidente del Comité de Defensa Nacional de la República Popular Democrática de Corea, dirigió sobre el terreno el Complejo Químico Juventud de Namhung.
					El Dirigente recorrió largo tiempo varios puntos de esa empresa, incluso la sala de control general de la producción de abono y el taller de expedición de abono, cerciorándose en detalles de cómo marchan la construcción y la producción.
					
					Es un milagro que los obreros de Namhung hayan terminado exitosamente en un corto plazo con las fuerzas y técnicas propias la construcción de los procesos de gasificación de la segunda serie, dijo y apreció mucho los méritos de ellos que levantaron otra creación gigantesca dando pruebas de su heroísmo masivo y abnegación patriótica. 
					
					La finalización exitosa de los procesos de gasificación de Namhung de la primera y segunda series resulta el brillante triunfo de la autóctona idea del Presidente acerca de la construcción de industria química y un noble fruto de la inagotable fuerza espiritual de nuestra clase obrera infinitamente fiel al partido y al líder, destacó. 
					
					Gracias al gran contingente de obreros revolucionarios y combativos que realizaron fulminantes méritos en la obra de gasificación bajo la consigna de "Si Corea decide, lo cumple", es poderoso nuestro partido y avanza siempre victoriosa nuestra patria socialista, apuntó. 
					
					Acto seguido, pasó por el corral, el taller de alimentos básicos y el Centro de Servicios Públicos Chongchunwon averiguando en detalles cómo se realizan el abastecimiento para los obreros y la vida cultural de ellos. 
					
					Todo le va bien a esta empresa porque marcha excelentemente el abastecimiento para los obreros, dijo y reconoció los esfuerzos de los funcionarios de partido y administración del complejo quienes se enfrascan en esa labor teniendo una correcta concepción de los obreros que realizan directamente la producción. 
					
					  El Dirigente vio en el Centro Chongchunwon, construido modernamente, los juegos de voleibol y natación y se mostró complacido por el suficiente descanso cultural de los obreros. 
					
					  Al ver los artículos de consumo popular de distintos tipos que se producen en la empresa, subrayó la necesidad de producir en lo cuantitativo y cualitativo esas cosas imprescindibles para elevar el nivel de la vida del pueblo. 
					
					  La tarea más importante del complejo es concentrar la fuerza en normalizar la producción de abono en un alto nivel y suministrar mucho más abonos a las granjas cooperativas socialistas, acotó.
					
					  Otra tarea importante es dinamizar los trabajos para aumentar las variedades de productos químicos necesarios a la vida del pueblo, destacó.
					
					  Por inmediato, es preciso acondicionar modernamente el proceso de producción de la fibra PP, agregó e indicó las tareas y remedios para el respecto. 
					
					  Los funcionarios, obreros y técnicos de aquí deben trabajar tenazmente por normalizar la producción y desarrollar su empresa con vistas al futuro, enfatizó. 
					
					El Dirigente fue acompañado en esta ocasión por Jang Song Thaek, miembro suplente del Buró Político del Comité Central del PTC y vicepresidente del CDN, Thae Jong Su, miembro suplente del Buró Político y secretario del CC del PTC, Ju Kyu Chang, miembro suplente del Buró Político y jefe de departamento del CC del PTC, y Hong In Bom, secretario responsable del Comité del PTC en la Provincia de Phyong-an del Sur.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il dirige fábricas de industria ligera en Pyongyang
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il dirige fábricas de industria ligera en Pyongyang
Pyongyang, 7 de mayo (ATCC) -- El Dirigente  Kim Jong Il, Secretario General del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y Presidente del Comité de Defensa Nacional de la República Popular Democrática de Corea, dirigió sobre el terreno las fábricas de industria ligera en esta capital. 
					Él estuvo primero en la Fábrica Textil de Pyongyang.
					
					Tras escuchar en la sala de control general las explicaciones sobre el proceso de producción de la tela de rayón de tetrón, recorrió varios puntos del taller de la misma tela averiguando en detalles el estado de producción, las especificaciones y propiedades de los nuevos equipos. 
					
					Examinó una por una las telas de rayón de tetrón para hacer el traje y la camisa, las telas rayadas de algodón y las cortinas y subrayó la necesidad de producir mucho más telas de diferentes tipos que convengan al gusto del pueblo. 
					
					Presenció en el taller la función del grupo de agitación artística móvil de la fábrica y la calificó de magnífica. 
					
					Seguidamente, presentó las tareas programáticas que incumben a la fábrica. 
					
					Llegado a la Fábrica de Confecciones Ponghwa de Rakrang, el Dirigente pasó por la sala de presentación del historial y estuvo en varios procesos de producción cerciorándose de los detalles de administración y producción.
					
					Elogió el modo de vida económica de la fábrica apuntando que si bien ella fue inaugurada hace poco, normaliza ya en alto nivel la producción aplicando muchas tecnologías nuevas, organizando con rentabilidad las gestiones empresariales e intensificando el movimiento masivo por la innovación técnica.
					
					Es importante aumentar las variedades de vestidos y mejorar su calidad, dijo y agregó que para ese fin, deben confeccionar diversos vestidos convenientes a cada estación del año y los artículos necesarios en la vida cotidiana de las mujeres.
					
					Además, los obreros deben elevar sus niveles de calificación para mejorar constantemente la calidad de sastrería conforme a lo que demanda la época, apuntó.
					
					Acto seguido, el Dirigente visitó la Fábrica de Jabón Ponghwa. 
					
					Al ver los jabones de lavar de buena calidad que se producen en cadena, se mostró muy satisfecho de que los obreros y técnicos de la fábrica hayan acondicionado magníficos procesos productivos para contribuir a la vida higiénica y cultural del pueblo y aumentaran vertiginosamente la producción dedicando toda su inteligencia y pasión. 
					
					Informado de que por su buena calidad, crecen las demandas del jabón de lavar de marca Ponghwa de esa fábrica, expresó su gran alegría por las posibilidades de suministrar al pueblo suficientes jabones de buena calidad.
					
					Por último, dirigió sobre el terreno la Fábrica de Portaminas de Pyongyang.
					
					Se enteró en detalles del estado de producción y modernización recorriendo varios puntos de la fábrica como la sala de presentación del historial y la de muestras. 
					
					En esta fábrica de nivel sofisticado forman una cadena automática todos los procesos desde la introducción de materias primas hasta el empaque y la expedición, calificó y reconoció los esfuerzos de los obreros de la fábrica que producen muchas cantidades de plumas de buena calidad. 
					
					Los funcionarios, obreros y técnicos de la fábrica aplicaron en alto nivel la tecnología CNC en colaboración con los profesores e investigadores de la Universidad Kim Il Sung y de la Universidad Politécnica Kim Chaek, dijo y apuntó que este éxito relevante manifiesta claramente la justeza y la vitalidad de la política de nuestro partido de dar importancia a la ciencia y técnica. 
					
					En los sectores cruciales del frente socialista, nuestros fidedignos estudiantes de nueva generación, profesores e investigadores, que han recibido la educación revolucionaria y autóctona, abren ahora la brecha en la construcción de una potencia económica, destacó.
					
					Afirmó que el contingente de científicos jóvenes es un gran orgullo de nuestro partido y pueblo, el tesoro y la fuerza motriz de prosperidad nacional. 
					
					Le acompañaron en esta ocasión Kim Ki Nam, miembro del Buró Político y secretario del CC del PTC, Kim Kyong Hui, miembro del Buró Político y jefa de departamento del CC del PTC, Jang Song Thaek, miembro suplente del Buró Político del CC del PTC y vicepresidente del CDN, Thae Jong Su, miembro suplente del Buró Político y secretario del CC del PTC, y Mun Kyong Dok, miembro suplente del Buró Político y secretario del CC del PTC y secretario responsable del Comité del PTC en la Ciudad de Pyongyang.

articles.title: Presidente pakistaní se refiere al problema de reunificación de Corea
articles.content:
Presidente pakistaní se refiere al problema de reunificación de Corea
Pyongyang, 7 de mayo (ATCC) -- El nuevo embajador coreano en Pakistán, Ro Kyong Chol, entregó el día 2 sus cartas credenciales al presidente pakistaní, Asif Ali Zardari.
					El mandatario dijo que no puede olvidar el encuentro con el Presidente Kim Il Sung durante su visita a Corea realizada en 1993 junto con la premier Bhutto.
					
					Deseó que el pueblo coreano ponga cuanto antes el punto final a la división del país y legue a las generaciones venideras la patria reunificada.

articles.title: Entidad británica publica en Internet artículo dedicado al EPC
articles.content:
Entidad británica publica en Internet artículo dedicado al EPC
Pyongyang, 7 de mayo (ATCC) -- Con motivo del 79º aniversario de la fundación del Ejército Popular de Corea, la Asociación de Estudio de la Política de Songun de Gran Bretaña publicó el 29 de abril en la página web un artículo conmemorativo.
					El artículo señala que el EPC es el invencible que se enfrenta de cara a cara con el imperialismo yanqui, enemigo de los pueblos progresistas del mundo.
					
					Destaca que el Presidente Kim Il Sung fundó el 25 de abril de 1932 la Guerrilla Popular Antijaponesa y después de la liberación del país, dio primacía a la construcción de las fuerzas armadas regulares y de la independiente industria de defensa nacional.
					
					Continúa que el EPC, fuerzas armadas del tipo Juche que continúan las tradiciones revolucionarias antijaponesas, asestó un golpe demoledor al imperialismo yanqui en la guerra coreana de la década de 1950 haciéndolo caer en la decadencia por primera vez de su historia.
					
					Subraya que el Dirigente Kim Jong Il, quien continúa con éxito la causa del Presidente de construcción del ejército de tipo Juche, inició en agosto de 1960 su guía sobre la revolución mediante el Songun, bajo la cual el EPC se ha fortalecido aún más.
					
					Concluye que el EPC, fundado por el Presidente y comandado por el Dirigente, es la fuerza armada del Songun.
